Shoryu, which should be towering high,"},{"lineNumber":195986,"originalJapaneseLine":"姿こそ見えないが、ハッキリと見据えていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it was not visible, she was clearly fixating on it."},{"lineNumber":195987,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ランス……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Rance...)"},{"lineNumber":195988,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あんたの子供達はみんな……","translatedEnglishLine":"(All of your children..."},{"lineNumber":195989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなに立派に自分のすることを見据えてる）","translatedEnglishLine":"are so admirable and focused on what they must do.)"},{"lineNumber":195990,"originalJapaneseLine":"（親のあんたは何してんのよ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(And what are you, their parent, doing...)"},{"lineNumber":195991,"originalJapaneseLine":"（…………馬鹿）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...Idiot.)"},{"lineNumber":195992,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は魔王ランスのもとを目指し進む。","translatedEnglishLine":"You all head towards Demon King Rance's place."},{"lineNumber":195993,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう歩みに迷いはない。","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no hesitation in your steps anymore."},{"lineNumber":195994,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、今――","translatedEnglishLine":"And now—"},{"lineNumber":195995,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は魔王ランスの住処である","translatedEnglishLine":"You have arrived at the foothills of Mt. Shoryu,"},{"lineNumber":195996,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山の麓に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"the dwelling place of Demon King Rance."},{"lineNumber":195997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……また、ここに来たんだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...We came here again, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":195998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ、今考えてみれば俺達アホだったよな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh, now that I think about it, we were idiots."},{"lineNumber":195999,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれっぽっちの強さで魔王に勝とうなんてさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thinking we could beat the Demon King with that little strength.\""},{"lineNumber":196000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺達、というか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We, or rather..."},{"lineNumber":196001,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言い出したのは長田君だすよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was Osada-kun who first said it...\""},{"lineNumber":196002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、ま、ま！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-W-Well!"},{"lineNumber":196003,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいじゃないっすか、それは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn’t that fine, though!?\""},{"lineNumber":196004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかくよ、相棒！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, partner!"},{"lineNumber":196005,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれから俺達も成長したんだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"We've grown up since then!"},{"lineNumber":196006,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今度こそ魔王ランスを倒してやろうぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, let's really defeat Demon King Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":196007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe...\""},{"lineNumber":196008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh..."},{"lineNumber":196009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君達も、成長したんじゃないかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've grown up too, haven't you?\""},{"lineNumber":196010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":196011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、おま、馬鹿馬鹿！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you idiot idiot!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッ、スシヌのくせに生意気な」
「とにかくさ！　とーちゃんを、
ドカーンとやっつければいいんでしょ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we just have to blast him away, right!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうだよね。
誰かがやらないといけないんだもんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone has to do it, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっしゃー、行こうぜ、相棒！」
「リベンジって奴だ！
今度こそ魔王ランスを倒すぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, we'll definitely defeat Demon King Rance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンプ地で魔王の子の面々が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the camp, the children of the Demon King

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やる気を見せて打倒魔王に向けて盛り上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: show their determination and get fired up to overthrow the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「三人とも、すごいね」
「アアン？　んだよ？」
「どうしたんだい、リセット。
嬉しそうな顔をして」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have a happy look on your face."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん」
あなた達三人を見て、
リセットはほにゃっと笑顔になる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset breaks into a soft smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「男の子はすぐに先に行っちゃうねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Boys always rush ahead so quickly, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひたたた……！
ほっぺ、ひっぱりゃないで……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t pull my cheeks like that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェはいつまでガキ扱いする気だ、アア？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How long do you intend to treat me like a kid, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット、僕の方が兄なんだからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Reset, I'm your older brother after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼ってもらわないと困るよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You'd be in trouble if you don't rely on me, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、らんぎひゃんまで……」
兄二人がリセットの頬を両側から引っ張っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her two older brothers were pulling Reset's cheeks from both sides.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひううう……
＜エール＞ひゃ、あひゅ……」
「まったく、何してるんだか」
志津香の目線が遠くを見る。
それは高くそびえている筈の翔竜山を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was towards Mt. Shoryu, which should be towering high,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姿こそ見えないが、ハッキリと見据えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it was not visible, she was clearly fixating on it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス……）
（あんたの子供達はみんな……
こんなに立派に自分のすることを見据えてる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are so admirable and focused on what they must do.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （親のあんたは何してんのよ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (And what are you, their parent, doing...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は魔王ランスのもとを目指し進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all head towards Demon King Rance's place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう歩みに迷いはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no hesitation in your steps anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、今――
あなた達は魔王ランスの住処である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have arrived at the foothills of Mt. Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の麓に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the dwelling place of Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……また、ここに来たんだな」
「へっ、今考えてみれば俺達アホだったよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, now that I think about it, we were idiots.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれっぽっちの強さで魔王に勝とうなんてさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking we could beat the Demon King with that little strength."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達、というか……
言い出したのは長田君だすよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was Osada-kun who first said it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、ま、ま！
いいじゃないっすか、それは！」
「とにかくよ、相棒！
あれから俺達も成長したんだ！
今度こそ魔王ランスを倒してやろうぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, let's really defeat Demon King Rance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ……」
君達も、成長したんじゃないかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've grown up too, haven't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーん！」
「ちょ、おま、馬鹿馬鹿！

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達、というか……
言い出したのは長田君だすよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was Osada-kun who first said it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、ま、ま！
いいじゃないっすか、それは！」
「とにかくよ、相棒！
あれから俺達も成長したんだ！
今度こそ魔王ランスを倒してやろうぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, let's really defeat Demon King Rance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ……」
君達も、成長したんじゃないかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've grown up too, haven't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーん！」
「ちょ、おま、馬鹿馬鹿！
